sourcesContent:
<template>
  <WeatherType/>
  <CurrentWeather location=""/>
  <WeekForcast/>
  <Character/>
</template>

<script>
import Character from './components/Character.vue';
import CurrentWeather from './components/CurrentWeather.vue';
import WeatherType from './components/WeatherType.vue'
import WeekForcast from './components/WeekForcast.vue';
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    WeatherType,
    CurrentWeather,
    WeekForcast,
    Character
  },
  async mounted() {
    const location = await this.getLocation();
    console.log('***', location);
    // TODO: add time to consistently update weather
    this.getWeather();
  },
  data() {
    return {
      latitude: null,
      longitude: null,
      location: null
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getWeather() {
      if(this.latitude === null && this.longitude === null) {
        navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition((posistion) => {
          this.latitude = posistion.coords.latitude;
          this.longitude = posistion.coords.longitude;
          // TODO: add check for no location
          // FUTURE: F vs C
          // FUTURE: wind speed k/s vs mph
          // FUTURE: precipitation in vs mm
          axios.get(`https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast?latitude=${this.latitude}&longitude=${this.longitude}&daily=sunrise,sunset&current=temperature_2m,weather_code,is_day&timezone=auto&forecast_days=1&wind_speed_unit=mph&temperature_unit=fahrenheit&precipitation_unit=inch`)
          .then((response) => {
            console.log('Response: ', response);
          });
      });
      } else {
        axios.get(`https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast?latitude=${this.latitude}&longitude=${this.longitude}&daily=sunrise,sunset&current=temperature_2m,weather_code,is_day&timezone=auto&forecast_days=1&wind_speed_unit=mph&temperature_unit=fahrenheit&precipitation_unit=inch`)
        .then((response) => {
          console.log('Response: ', response);
        });
      }
    },
    async getLocation() {
      return navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition((posistion) => {
          return posistion.coords;
      });
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
